data.title: Mountain View Middle School
data.text:
Beaverton School District has partnered with local BBQ sauce makers, Felton and Maryâ€™s. Learn some history behind the company and see what students at Mountain View Middle School think of the sauce!

Thanks to the support of the Beaverton Education Foundation and a generous donation from the Juan Young Trust, the Beaverton School District hosted its 3rd annual Middle School Band Camp at Mountainside High School.

Counselors are an integral part of our school staff. As we celebrate National School Counseling Week, we're highlighting the counseling team at Mountain View Middle School.
